name.ja: <ruby>百鬼羅刹<rt>ゴブリンライダー</rt></ruby> グリアーレ<ruby>三<rt>さん</rt></ruby><ruby>傑<rt>けつ</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2+ Level 3 monsters
If there are 3 or more Xyz Materials attached to monsters on the field, your "Goblin" monsters can attack directly. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned while this monster is on the field: You can target 1 of them; detach 1 Xyz Material from a monster on the field, and if you do, change the targeted monster's battle position. Once per turn, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from a monster on the field, and if you do, negate the attack.
